snippet: Cuban officials used the event to condemn the United States, in what one official called “the hour of truth for the Obama administration.”
lead_paragraph: Cuban officials used the event to condemn the United States, in what one official called “the hour of truth for the Obama administration.”

headline.main: One of ‘Cuban Five’ Spies Is Released on Probation
